message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to invest in this product, and I'm happy to offer it to you for $18000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to make a serious investment, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still confident that my product will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $16500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to go up to $15000, but I think that's as high as I can go.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe my product is worth more to you than $15000. I'm willing to compromise further, so I'm counteroffering at $16000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $14500, but that's the maximum I can offer.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $16000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $15800. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to your business.
I'm willing to meet you at $14000, but I'm not sure if I want to go any higher. I'm starting to consider buying from John, but I still value the product and would like to make a deal with you.
